SEARCH
Package model

Class CoffeeBusiness

java.lang.Object
model.CoffeeBusiness
public class CoffeeBusiness extends Object
Manages the business logic of the coffee truck operation. Maintains a list of trucks and a price list.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CoffeeBusiness()
    Constructs a CoffeeBusiness with an empty truck list and default price list.

      Parameters:

      type - truck type ("regular" or "special")

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales()

    • addSales

      public void addSales(String name, double price)
      Adds a sales amount to the corresponding coffee product.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product ("americano", "cappuccino", or "latte")
      price - the sales amount to be added

    • getSales

      public double getSales(String name)
      Returns the total sales accumulated for a specific coffee product.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product ("americano", "cappuccino", or "latte")
      Returns:
      the total sales for the specified product, or 0 if the name is invalid
